attributes.action: Make the minimum sentence for sexual communication with a child 2 years in jail
attributes.additional_details: We believe present sentencing guidelines are not adequate.
attributes.background: We want the Government to amend the legislation governing the offence of sexual communication with a child so that the minimum sentence for this crime is a two year custodial sentence.
